an9.19:4.1: “Mendicants, tonight, many beautiful gods, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, came to me,
an9.19:4.4: ‘Sir, formerly when we were human beings, renunciants came to our homes.
an9.19:4.5: We politely rose for them, but we didn’t bow.
an9.19:4.6: And so, having not fulfilled our duty, full of remorse and regret, we were reborn in a lesser realm.’
an9.19:5.1: Then several other gods came to me and said:
an9.19:5.2: ‘Sir, formerly when we were human beings, renunciants came to our homes.
an9.19:5.3: We politely rose for them and bowed, but we didn’t offer a seat.
an9.19:5.4: And so, having not fulfilled our duty, full of remorse and regret, we were reborn in a lesser realm.’
an9.19:6.1: Then several other gods came to me and said:
an9.19:6.2: ‘Sir, formerly when we were human beings, renunciants came to our homes.
an9.19:6.3: We politely rose for them, bowed, and offered a seat, but we didn’t share as best we could. …’
an9.19:6.4: ‘We didn’t sit nearby to listen to the teachings. …’
an9.19:6.5: ‘We didn’t listen closely to the teachings. …’
an9.19:6.7: ‘We didn’t examine the meaning of teachings we’d memorized. …’
an9.19:6.8: ‘Having understood the meaning and the teaching, we didn’t practice accordingly.
an9.19:6.9: And so, having not fulfilled our duty, full of remorse and regret, we were reborn in a lesser realm.’
an9.19:7.1: Then several other gods came to me and said:
an9.19:7.2: ‘Sir, formerly when we were human beings, renunciants came to our homes.
an9.19:7.3: We politely rose, bowed, and offered them a seat. We shared as best we could. We sat near by to listen to the teachings, listened closely, memorized them, and examined their meaning. Understanding the teaching and the meaning we practiced accordingly.
an9.19:7.4: And so, having fulfilled our duty, free of remorse and regret, we were reborn in a superior realm.’
an9.19:7.5: Here are these roots of trees, and here are these empty huts.
an9.19:7.6: Practice absorption, mendicants! Don’t be negligent! Don’t regret it later, like those former gods.”
